DC CODE ยง 8-231.07

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: A tenant may provide information to the Mayor concerning deteriorated paint or lead-based paint hazards within a property or elevated blood levels of a person at risk.
The provision of information in subsection (a) of this section shall be considered tenant rights.

title.text: Environmental and Animal Control and Protection (Refs & Annos)
